RULES

GENERAL RULES

1. Treat me and others with respect.
2. Keep the chat in the set language as much as possible. (Use translate machines when needed, i'm pretty much sure i'll be able to understand!)
3. Avoid bringing up other VTubers when it is not neccessary.
4. No backseating unless I ask for help. (or at least be funny with it)
5. Don't spam or troll.
6. Avoid trying to mention my PL (past life).
There will be aditional rules as per context or when it gets updated. In that case, there will be alerts about it.
